channel.title: Devo 7
channel.description:
Ok, first, I need to know how to make nonwild, can someone show me the whole codes and where to put it?
Next, I want to change an item price, and I don't know how to do it...can someone help?
How do you make it so that if you go attack for an npc you kind of follow them like in Runescape?
How do you stop the x offer trade dupe?
